#################################################

Release Name:
Cubology.(PlayFirst.Games)-WWW

Release Type: PC Game
Game: Cubology
Language: English
 
#################################################

System Requirements:
Processor: Pentium - 450MHz or better
RAM: 64MB
DirectX Version: 8.1 or above
Keyboard and Mouse: Supported
Operating System: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/8.1
	
#################################################

How to install:
1. Run Cubology_setup.exe
2. Install by following the on-screen instructions.
3. Play!

#################################################

About the game:

Beautiful minerals have helped the Mars mining colony stay in power. Now they are being beamed from Mars surface to the orbiting station where they will be sorted and sent to Earth. The financial success of this outpost has been unprecedented and unfortunately, the years have not been kind to the station's model 1-2AC sorting droid (affectionately known as "I-ZAC"). Help I-ZAC sort minerals so he can take a break and be restored to operational capacity!

#################################################

A: Yes.
